alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 20 at 7:59PM CDT until June 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Rankin and Madison Counties. Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 20.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning and continue falling to 16.1 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 20.1 Tue 6 pm CDT 20.1 20.1 20.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 900 AM CDT.
